action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary: Declares that the Congress rejects and condemns as unjustified and unsupported by law the position of the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission (EEOC) that English-only employment rules violate title VII (Equal Employment Opportunity) of the Civil Rights Act of 1964. Calls on the EEOC to suspend enforcement of that position.
